blocks.name: ceven
blocks.content: Extend the definition of a class to include the set of even numbers.
blocks.origin: const class ceven { Even }

blocks.name: diff.ceven.s
diff.ceven.c
diff.ceven.w
codd
blocks.content: Extend the definition of a class to include the set of odd numbers.
blocks.origin: const class codd { Odd }

blocks.name: diff.codd.s
diff.codd.c
diff.codd.w
df-even
blocks.content: Define the set of even numbers. (Contributed by AV, 14-Jun-2020.)

blocks.name: df-odd
blocks.content: Define the set of odd numbers. (Contributed by AV, 14-Jun-2020.)

blocks.name: iseven
blocks.content: The predicate "is an even number". An even number is an integer which is divisible by 2, i.e. the result of dividing the even integer by 2 is still an integer. (Contributed by AV, 14-Jun-2020.)

blocks.name: isodd
blocks.content: The predicate "is an odd number". An odd number is an integer which is not divisible by 2, i.e. the result of dividing the odd integer increased by 1 and then divided by 2 is still an integer. (Contributed by AV, 14-Jun-2020.)

blocks.name: evenz
blocks.content: An even number is an integer. (Contributed by AV, 14-Jun-2020.)

blocks.name: oddz
blocks.content: An odd number is an integer. (Contributed by AV, 14-Jun-2020.)

blocks.name: evendiv2z
blocks.content: The result of dividing an even number by 2 is an integer. (Contributed by AV, 15-Jun-2020.)

blocks.name: oddp1div2z
blocks.content: The result of dividing an odd number increased by 1 and then divided by 2 is an integer. (Contributed by AV, 15-Jun-2020.)

blocks.name: oddm1div2z
blocks.content: The result of dividing an odd number decreased by 1 and then divided by 2 is an integer. (Contributed by AV, 15-Jun-2020.)

blocks.name: isodd2
blocks.content: The predicate "is an odd number". An odd number is an integer which is not divisible by 2, i.e. the result of dividing the odd number decreased by 1 and then divided by 2 is still an integer. (Contributed by AV, 15-Jun-2020.)

blocks.name: dfodd2
blocks.content: Alternate definition for odd numbers. (Contributed by AV, 15-Jun-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm dfodd2(setvar s0) {
  |- wceq(codd, crab(s0, cz, wcel(co(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz)))
} = {
  eqriv(hs0, codd, crab(s0, cz, wcel(co(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz)))
  bitr4i(wcel(cv(hs0), codd), wcel(cv(hs0), crab(s0, cz, wcel(co(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(co(co(cv(hs0), cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz)))
  isodd2(cv(hs0))
  elrab(s0, cv(hs0), cz, wcel(co(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz), wcel(co(co(cv(hs0), cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz))
  eleq1d(co(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz, co(co(cv(hs0), cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  oveq1d(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2, co(cv(hs0), cmin, nat1), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  oveq1(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cmin, nat1)
  diff.hs0.c(codd)
  diff.hs0.c(crab(s0, cz, wcel(co(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz)))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, co(co(cv(hs0), cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz)
  diff.co.s(s0, co(cv(hs0), cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)
  diff.co.s(s0, cv(hs0), cmin, nat1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cmin.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.cdiv.s(s0)
  diff.nat2.s(s0)
  diff.cz.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dfodd2(setvar s0) {
  ⊢ Odd = { s0 ∈ ℤ |((s0[-]1)[÷]2)∈ ℤ }
} = {
  eqriv(hs0, codd, { s0 ∈ ℤ |((s0[-]1)[÷]2)∈ ℤ })
  bitr4i(hs0 ∈ Odd, hs0 ∈ { s0 ∈ ℤ |((s0[-]1)[÷]2)∈ ℤ }, (hs0 ∈ ℤ ∧((hs0[-]1)[÷]2)∈ ℤ))
  isodd2(hs0)
  elrab(s0, hs0, cz, ((s0[-]1)[÷]2)∈ ℤ, ((hs0[-]1)[÷]2)∈ ℤ)
  eleq1d(((s0[-]1)[÷]2), cz, ((hs0[-]1)[÷]2), s0 = hs0)
  oveq1d((s0[-]1), cdiv, nat2, (hs0[-]1), s0 = hs0)
  oveq1(s0, hs0, cmin, nat1)
  diff.hs0.c(codd)
  diff.hs0.c({ s0 ∈ ℤ |((s0[-]1)[÷]2)∈ ℤ })
  diff.wcel.s(s0, ((hs0[-]1)[÷]2), cz)
  diff.co.s(s0, (hs0[-]1), cdiv, nat2)
  diff.co.s(s0, hs0, cmin, nat1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cmin.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.cdiv.s(s0)
  diff.nat2.s(s0)
  diff.cz.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: dfodd6
blocks.content: Alternate definition for odd numbers. (Contributed by AV, 18-Jun-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm dfodd6(setvar s0, setvar s1) {
  |- wceq(codd, crab(s0, cz, wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cv(s0), co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)), caddc, nat1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  eqtri(codd, crab(s0, cz, wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cv(s0), co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)), caddc, nat1)))), crab(s0, cz, wcel(co(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz)))
  dfodd2(s0)
  rabbiia(s0, cz, wcel(co(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz), wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cv(s0), co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)), caddc, nat1))))
  impbid(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(co(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz), wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cv(s0), co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)), caddc, nat1))))
  ex(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(co(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz), wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cv(s0), co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)), caddc, nat1))))
  rspcedvd(s1, cz, co(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(co(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz)), wceq(cv(s0), co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)), caddc, nat1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s0)))
  simpr(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(co(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz))
  eqeq2d(cv(s0), co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)), caddc, nat1), cv(s0), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(co(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz)), wceq(cv(s1), co(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2))))
  eqtrd(co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)), caddc, nat1), cv(s0), co(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(co(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz)), wceq(cv(s1), co(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2))))
  oveq1d(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)), caddc, nat1, co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(co(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz)), wceq(cv(s1), co(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2))))
  sylan9eqr(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(co(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz)), wceq(cv(s1), co(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)))
  oveq2(cv(s1), co(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), nat2, cmul)
  syl(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(co(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz)), wceq(co(nat2, cmul, co(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1)), w3a(wcel(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cc), wcel(nat2, cc), wne(nat2, nat0)))
  adantr(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(co(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz), w3a(wcel(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cc), wcel(nat2, cc), wne(nat2, nat0)))
  3jca(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cc), wcel(nat2, cc), wne(nat2, nat0))
  zcnd(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), wcel(cv(s0), cz))
  peano2zm(cv(s0))
  a1i(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wne(nat2, nat0))
  divcan2(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), nat2)
  adantr(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(co(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz)), wceq(cv(s1), co(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1), cv(s0)))
  adantr(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(co(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1), cv(s0)))
  syl(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cc))
  zcn(cv(s0))
  npcan1(cv(s0))
  eqidd(cv(s0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(co(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz)))
  rexlimdva2(s1, cz, wcel(cv(s0), cz), wceq(cv(s0), co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)), caddc, nat1)), wcel(co(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz))
  eqeltrd(co(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz, cv(s1), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(cv(s1), cz)), wceq(cv(s0), co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)), caddc, nat1))))
  eqtrd(co(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cv(s1), co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)), cdiv, nat2), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(cv(s1), cz)), wceq(cv(s0), co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)), caddc, nat1))))
  oveq1d(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2, co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(cv(s1), cz)), wceq(cv(s0), co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)), caddc, nat1))))
  sylan9eqr(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)), co(co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)), caddc, nat1), cmin, nat1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(cv(s1), cz)), wceq(cv(s0), co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)), caddc, nat1)))
  oveq1(cv(s0), co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)), caddc, nat1), cmin, nat1)
  syl(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(cv(s1), cz)), wceq(co(co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)), caddc, nat1), cmin, nat1), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1))), wcel(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)), cc))
  syl2an(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(cv(s1), cz), wcel(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)), cc), wcel(nat2, cc), wcel(cv(s1), cc))
  2cnd(wcel(cv(s0), cz))
  mulcl(nat2, cv(s1))
  pncan1(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)))
  adantr(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(cv(s1), cz)), wceq(cv(s0), co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)), caddc, nat1)), wceq(co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)), cdiv, nat2), cv(s1)))
  divcan3d(nat2, cv(s1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(cv(s1), cz)))
  adantl(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(cv(s1), cz), wcel(cv(s1), cc))
  zcn(cv(s1))
  2cnd(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(cv(s1), cz)))
  a1i(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(cv(s1), cz)), wne(nat2, nat0))
  2ne0()
  adantr(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(cv(s1), cz)), wceq(cv(s0), co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)), caddc, nat1)), wcel(cv(s1), cz))
  simpr(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(cv(s1), cz))
  diff.wa.s(s1, wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(co(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s0), cv(s0))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), cz)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, co(co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz)
  diff.co.s(s1, co(cv(s0), cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)
  diff.co.s(s1, cv(s0), cmin, nat1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cmin.s(s1)
  diff.nat1.s(s1)
  diff.cdiv.s(s1)
  diff.nat2.s(s1)
  diff.cz.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: dfeven4
blocks.content: Alternate definition for even numbers. (Contributed by AV, 18-Jun-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm dfeven4(setvar s0, setvar s1) {
  |- wceq(ceven, crab(s0, cz, wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cv(s0), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  eqtri(ceven, crab(s0, cz, wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cv(s0), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1))))), crab(s0, cz, wcel(co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2), cz)))
  df-even(s0)
  rabbiia(s0, cz, wcel(co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2), cz), wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cv(s0), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)))))
  impbid(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2), cz), wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cv(s0), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)))))
  ex(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2), cz), wrex(s1, cz, wceq(cv(s0), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)))))
  rspcedvd(s1, cz, co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2), cz)), wceq(cv(s0), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s0), co(nat2, cmul, co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2))))
  simpr(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2), cz))
  adantl(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2), cz)), wceq(cv(s1), co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2)), wb(wceq(cv(s0), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1))), wceq(cv(s0), co(nat2, cmul, co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2)))))
  eqeq2d(cv(s0), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)), co(nat2, cmul, co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2)), wceq(cv(s1), co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2)))
  oveq2(cv(s1), co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2), nat2, cmul)
  eqcomd(cv(s0), co(nat2, cmul, co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2), cz)))
  divcan2d(nat2, cv(s0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2), cz)))
  adantr(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2), cz), wcel(cv(s0), cc))
  zcn(cv(s0))
  2cnd(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2), cz)))
  a1i(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2), cz)), wne(nat2, nat0))
  rexlimdva2(s1, cz, wcel(cv(s0), cz), wceq(cv(s0), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1))), wcel(co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2), cz))
  eqeltrd(co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2), cz, cv(s1), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(cv(s1), cz)), wceq(cv(s0), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)))))
  sylan9eqr(co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2), cv(s1), co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)), cdiv, nat2), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(cv(s1), cz)), wceq(cv(s0), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1))))
  oveq1(cv(s0), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1)), cdiv, nat2)
  divcan3d(nat2, cv(s1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(cv(s1), cz)))
  adantl(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(cv(s1), cz), wcel(cv(s1), cc))
  zcn(cv(s1))
  2cnd(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(cv(s1), cz)))
  a1i(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(cv(s1), cz)), wne(nat2, nat0))
  2ne0()
  adantr(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(cv(s1), cz)), wceq(cv(s0), co(nat2, cmul, cv(s1))), wcel(cv(s1), cz))
  simpr(wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(cv(s1), cz))
  diff.wa.s(s1, wcel(cv(s0), cz), wcel(co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2), cz))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s0), co(nat2, cmul, co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2)))
  diff.co.s(s1, nat2, cmul, co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2))
  diff.cmul.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), cz)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, co(cv(s0), cdiv, nat2), cz)
  diff.co.s(s1, cv(s0), cdiv, nat2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cdiv.s(s1)
  diff.nat2.s(s1)
  diff.cz.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: evenm1odd
blocks.content: The predecessor of an even number is odd. (Contributed by AV, 16-Jun-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm evenm1odd(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, ceven), wcel(co(c0, cmin, nat1), codd))
} = {
  sylanbrc(wcel(c0, ceven), wcel(co(c0, cmin, nat1), codd), wcel(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cz), wcel(co(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz))
  syl(wcel(c0, ceven), wcel(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cz), wcel(c0, cz))
  evenz(c0)
  peano2zm(c0)
  sylbi(wcel(c0, ceven), wcel(co(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cz)))
  iseven(c0)
  biimpa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cz), wcel(co(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz))
  eleq1d(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cz, co(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2), wcel(c0, cz))
  oveq1d(c0, cdiv, nat2, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1), wcel(c0, cz))
  eqcomd(c0, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1), wcel(c0, cz))
  syl(wcel(c0, cz), wceq(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1), c0), wcel(c0, cc))
  zcn(c0)
  npcan1(c0)
  isodd(co(c0, cmin, nat1))
}

blocks.name: evenp1odd
blocks.content: The successor of an even number is odd. (Contributed by AV, 16-Jun-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm evenp1odd(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, ceven), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), codd))
} = {
  sylanbrc(wcel(c0, ceven), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), codd), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cz), wcel(co(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz))
  peano2zd(c0, wcel(c0, ceven))
  evenz(c0)
  sylbi(wcel(c0, ceven), wcel(co(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cz)))
  iseven(c0)
  biimpa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cz), wcel(co(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz))
  eleq1d(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cz, co(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), wcel(c0, cz))
  oveq1d(c0, cdiv, nat2, co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, nat1), wcel(c0, cz))
  eqcomd(c0, co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, nat1), wcel(c0, cz))
  syl(wcel(c0, cz), wceq(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, nat1), c0), wcel(c0, cc))
  zcn(c0)
  pncan1(c0)
  isodd2(co(c0, caddc, nat1))
}

blocks.name: oddp1eveni
blocks.content: The successor of an odd number is even. (Contributed by AV, 16-Jun-2020.)

blocks.name: oddm1eveni
blocks.content: The predecessor of an odd number is even. (Contributed by AV, 6-Jul-2020.)

blocks.name: evennodd
blocks.content: An even number is not an odd number. (Contributed by AV, 16-Jun-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm evennodd(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, ceven), wn(wcel(c0, codd)))
} = {
  sylibr(wcel(c0, ceven), wn(wcel(c0, codd)), wo(wn(wcel(c0, cz)), wn(wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz))))
  olcd(wcel(c0, ceven), wn(wcel(c0, cz)), wn(wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz)))
  sylbi(wcel(c0, ceven), wn(wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz)), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cz)))
  iseven(c0)
  imp(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cz), wn(wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz)))
  biimpd(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cz), wn(wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz)))
  zeo2(c0)
  bitri(wn(wcel(c0, codd)), wo(wn(wcel(c0, cz)), wn(wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz))), wn(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz))))
  notbii(wcel(c0, codd), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz)))
  isodd(c0)
  ianor(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz))
}

blocks.name: oddneven
blocks.content: An odd number is not an even number. (Contributed by AV, 16-Jun-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm oddneven(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, codd), wn(wcel(c0, ceven)))
} = {
  sylibr(wcel(c0, codd), wn(wcel(c0, ceven)), wo(wn(wcel(c0, cz)), wn(wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cz))))
  olcd(wcel(c0, codd), wn(wcel(c0, cz)), wn(wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cz)))
  sylbi(wcel(c0, codd), wn(wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cz)), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz)))
  isodd(c0)
  imp(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz), wn(wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cz)))
  con2d(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cz))
  biimpd(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cz), wn(wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz)))
  zeo2(c0)
  xchnxbir(wcel(c0, ceven), wo(wn(wcel(c0, cz)), wn(wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cz))), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cz)))
  ianor(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cz))
  iseven(c0)
}

blocks.name: enege
blocks.content: The negative of an even number is even. (Contributed by AV, 20-Jun-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm enege(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, ceven), wcel(cneg(c0), ceven))
} = {
  3imtr4i(wcel(c0, ceven), wcel(cneg(c0), ceven), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cz)), wa(wcel(cneg(c0), cz), wcel(co(cneg(c0), cdiv, nat2), cz)))
  jca(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cz)), wcel(cneg(c0), cz), wcel(co(cneg(c0), cdiv, nat2), cz))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cz), wcel(cneg(c0), cz))
  znegcl(c0)
  mpbid(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cz)), wcel(co(cneg(c0), cdiv, nat2), cz), wcel(cneg(co(c0, cdiv, nat2)), cz))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cz), wcel(cneg(co(c0, cdiv, nat2)), cz))
  znegcl(co(c0, cdiv, nat2))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cz)), wb(wcel(cneg(co(c0, cdiv, nat2)), cz), wcel(co(cneg(c0), cdiv, nat2), cz)), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(nat2, cc), wne(nat2, nat0)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cz), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(nat2, cc), wne(nat2, nat0)))
  3jca(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(nat2, cc), wne(nat2, nat0))
  zcn(c0)
  2cnd(wcel(c0, cz))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cz), wne(nat2, nat0))
  2ne0()
  eleq1d(cneg(co(c0, cdiv, nat2)), cz, co(cneg(c0), cdiv, nat2), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(nat2, cc), wne(nat2, nat0)))
  divneg(c0, nat2)
  iseven(c0)
  iseven(cneg(c0))
}

blocks.name: onego
blocks.content: The negative of an odd number is odd. (Contributed by AV, 20-Jun-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm onego(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, codd), wcel(cneg(c0), codd))
} = {
  3imtr4i(wcel(c0, codd), wcel(cneg(c0), codd), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz)), wa(wcel(cneg(c0), cz), wcel(co(co(cneg(c0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz)))
  jca(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz)), wcel(cneg(c0), cz), wcel(co(co(cneg(c0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz), wcel(cneg(c0), cz))
  znegcl(c0)
  mpbird(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz)), wcel(co(co(cneg(c0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz), wcel(co(cneg(co(c0, cmin, nat1)), cdiv, nat2), cz))
  mpbid(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz)), wcel(co(cneg(co(c0, cmin, nat1)), cdiv, nat2), cz), wcel(cneg(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), cz))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz), wcel(cneg(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), cz))
  znegcl(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz)), wb(wcel(cneg(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), cz), wcel(co(cneg(co(c0, cmin, nat1)), cdiv, nat2), cz)), wcel(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cc), wcel(nat2, cc), wne(nat2, nat0))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz), wcel(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cc))
  zcnd(co(c0, cmin, nat1), wcel(c0, cz))
  peano2zm(c0)
  2cnd(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz)))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz)), wne(nat2, nat0))
  2ne0()
  eleq1d(cneg(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), cz, co(cneg(co(c0, cmin, nat1)), cdiv, nat2), w3a(wcel(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cc), wcel(nat2, cc), wne(nat2, nat0)))
  divneg(co(c0, cmin, nat1), nat2)
  adantr(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz), wb(wcel(co(co(cneg(c0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz), wcel(co(cneg(co(c0, cmin, nat1)), cdiv, nat2), cz)))
  eleq1d(co(co(cneg(c0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz, co(cneg(co(c0, cmin, nat1)), cdiv, nat2), wcel(c0, cz))
  oveq1d(co(cneg(c0), caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2, cneg(co(c0, cmin, nat1)), wcel(c0, cz))
  syl2anc(wcel(c0, cz), wceq(co(cneg(c0), caddc, nat1), cneg(co(c0, cmin, nat1))), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(nat1, cc))
  zcn(c0)
  1cnd(wcel(c0, cz))
  eqcomd(co(cneg(c0), caddc, nat1), cneg(co(c0, cmin, nat1)), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(nat1, cc)))
  negsubdi(c0, nat1)
  isodd2(c0)
  isodd(cneg(c0))
}

blocks.name: m1expevenALTV
blocks.content: Exponentiation of -1 by an even power. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 29-Jun-2017.) (Revised by AV, 6-Jul-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm m1expevenALTV(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, ceven), wceq(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, c0), nat1))
} = {
  sylbi(wcel(c0, ceven), wceq(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, c0), nat1), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wrex(hs0, cz, wceq(c0, co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0))))))
  elrab2(hs1, c0, ceven, cz, wrex(hs0, cz, wceq(c0, co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)))), wrex(hs0, cz, wceq(cv(hs1), co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)))))
  rexbidv(hs0, cz, wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0))), wceq(c0, co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0))))
  eqeq1(cv(hs1), c0, co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)))
  dfeven4(hs1, hs0)
  imp(wcel(c0, cz), wrex(hs0, cz, wceq(c0, co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)))), wceq(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, c0), nat1))
  rexlimdva2(hs0, cz, wcel(c0, cz), wceq(c0, co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0))), wceq(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, c0), nat1))
  sylan9eqr(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, c0), nat1, co(cneg(nat1), cexp, co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0))), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(cv(hs0), cz)), wceq(c0, co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0))))
  oveq2(c0, co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)), cneg(nat1), cexp)
  adantl(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wceq(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0))), nat1))
  eqtrd(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0))), nat1, co(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, nat2), cexp, cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cz))
  syl22anc(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wceq(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0))), co(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, nat2), cexp, cv(hs0))), wcel(cneg(nat1), cc), wne(cneg(nat1), nat0), wcel(nat2, cz), wcel(cv(hs0), cz))
  a1i(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(cneg(nat1), cc))
  neg1cn()
  a1i(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wne(cneg(nat1), nat0))
  neg1ne0()
  a1i(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(nat2, cz))
  2z()
  id(wcel(cv(hs0), cz))
  expmulz(cneg(nat1), nat2, cv(hs0))
  syl5eq(co(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, nat2), cexp, cv(hs0)), nat1, co(nat1, cexp, cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cz))
  oveq1i(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, nat2), cexp, cv(hs0), nat1)
  neg1sqe1()
  1exp(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cz)
  diff.hs1.w(wrex(hs0, cz, wceq(c0, co(nat2, cmul, cv(hs0)))))
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cv(hs1), c0))
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cz))
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, c0), nat1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm m1expevenALTV(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ Even →(-u(1)[^]c0)= 1)
} = {
  sylbi(c0 ∈ Even, (-u(1)[^]c0)= 1, (c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ ∃(hs0 ∈ ℤ, c0 =(2[×]hs0))))
  elrab2(hs1, c0, ceven, cz, ∃(hs0 ∈ ℤ, c0 =(2[×]hs0)), ∃(hs0 ∈ ℤ, hs1 =(2[×]hs0)))
  rexbidv(hs0, cz, hs1 = c0, hs1 =(2[×]hs0), c0 =(2[×]hs0))
  eqeq1(hs1, c0, (2[×]hs0))
  dfeven4(hs1, hs0)
  imp(c0 ∈ ℤ, ∃(hs0 ∈ ℤ, c0 =(2[×]hs0)), (-u(1)[^]c0)= 1)
  rexlimdva2(hs0, cz, c0 ∈ ℤ, c0 =(2[×]hs0), (-u(1)[^]c0)= 1)
  sylan9eqr((-u(1)[^]c0), nat1, (-u(1)[^](2[×]hs0)), (c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ hs0 ∈ ℤ), c0 =(2[×]hs0))
  oveq2(c0, (2[×]hs0), -u(1), cexp)
  adantl(c0 ∈ ℤ, hs0 ∈ ℤ, (-u(1)[^](2[×]hs0))= 1)
  eqtrd((-u(1)[^](2[×]hs0)), nat1, ((-u(1)[^]2)[^]hs0), hs0 ∈ ℤ)
  syl22anc(hs0 ∈ ℤ, (-u(1)[^](2[×]hs0))=((-u(1)[^]2)[^]hs0), -u(1)∈ ℂ, -u(1)≠ 0, 2 ∈ ℤ, hs0 ∈ ℤ)
  a1i(hs0 ∈ ℤ, -u(1)∈ ℂ)
  neg1cn()
  a1i(hs0 ∈ ℤ, -u(1)≠ 0)
  neg1ne0()
  a1i(hs0 ∈ ℤ, 2 ∈ ℤ)
  2z()
  id(hs0 ∈ ℤ)
  expmulz(-u(1), nat2, hs0)
  syl5eq(((-u(1)[^]2)[^]hs0), nat1, (1[^]hs0), hs0 ∈ ℤ)
  oveq1i((-u(1)[^]2), cexp, hs0, nat1)
  neg1sqe1()
  1exp(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cz)
  diff.hs1.w(∃(hs0 ∈ ℤ, c0 =(2[×]hs0)))
  diff.hs0.w(hs1 = c0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ∈ ℤ)
  diff.hs0.w((-u(1)[^]c0)= 1)
}

blocks.name: m1expoddALTV
blocks.content: Exponentiation of -1 by an odd power. (Contributed by AV, 6-Jul-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm m1expoddALTV(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, codd), wceq(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, c0), cneg(nat1)))
} = {
  3eqtrd(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, c0), cneg(nat1), co(cneg(nat1), cexp, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1)), co(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), cmul, cneg(nat1)), wcel(c0, codd))
  oveq2d(cneg(nat1), cexp, c0, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1), wcel(c0, codd))
  syl(wcel(c0, codd), wceq(c0, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1)), wcel(c0, cc))
  zcnd(c0, wcel(c0, codd))
  eqcomd(c0, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1), wcel(c0, cc))
  npcan1(c0)
  expp1zd(cneg(nat1), co(c0, cmin, nat1), wcel(c0, codd))
  a1i(wcel(c0, codd), wne(cneg(nat1), nat0))
  neg1ne0()
  syl(wcel(c0, codd), wcel(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cz), wcel(c0, cz))
  oddz(c0)
  peano2zm(c0)
  eqtrd(co(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), cmul, cneg(nat1)), cneg(nat1), co(nat1, cmul, cneg(nat1)), wcel(c0, codd))
  oveq1d(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), cmul, cneg(nat1), nat1, wcel(c0, codd))
  syl(wcel(c0, codd), wceq(co(cneg(nat1), cexp, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), nat1), wcel(co(c0, cmin, nat1), ceven))
  oddm1eveni(c0)
  m1expevenALTV(co(c0, cmin, nat1))
  mulid2d(cneg(nat1), wcel(c0, codd))
  a1i(wcel(c0, codd), wcel(cneg(nat1), cc))
  neg1cn()
}
